subject: p10959054
Findings: Heart size and mediastinum are stable. There is prominence of the upper right mediastinum, overall stable since prior examination. There is interval improvement in the right lung consolidations. There is loculated effusion present along the posterior aspect of the right hemithorax, loculated and most likely chronic since it had been present on, PET CT. No new consolidations demonstrated. Hyperinflation is prominent.
